content: In February ... quote: WASHINGTON - President Barack Obama said Wednesday that heavy-equipment maker Caterpillar has informed him it will rehire some of the thousands of workers it has laid off in recent weeks if Congress passes an economic stimulus bill. "The time for talk has passed," Obama said. <more> "http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/29139938/" Today, quote: PITTSBURGH (AP) - Caterpillar Inc. on Tuesday announced plans to lay off more than 2,400 employees at five plants in Illinois, Indiana and Georgia as the heavy equipment maker continues to cut costs amid the global economic downturn. . . In response to the worsening conditions, Caterpillar in January announced job cuts that will ultimately eliminate 20,000 positions. <more> "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=D96VT8RO0&show_article=1" That's stimulus for you ... sure glad that 787 billion bill passed.
quote: WASHINGTON - President Barack Obama said Wednesday that heavy-equipment maker Caterpillar has informed him it will rehire some of the thousands of workers it has laid off in recent weeks if Congress passes an economic stimulus bill. "The time for talk has passed," Obama said. <more> "http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/29139938/"
reply: In February ...  Today, quote: PITTSBURGH (AP) - Caterpillar Inc. on Tuesday announced plans to lay off more than 2,400 employees at five plants in Illinois, Indiana and Georgia as the heavy equipment maker continues to cut costs amid the global economic downturn. . . In response to the worsening conditions, Caterpillar in January announced job cuts that will ultimately eliminate 20,000 positions. <more> "http://www.breitbart.com/article.php?id=D96VT8RO0&show_article=1" That's stimulus for you ... sure glad that 787 billion bill passed.
title: Then Was Then; Now Is Now
